newsitem.title: USA: National Education confirms Harcourt talks.
newsitem.headline: National Education confirms Harcourt talks.

text.p: National Education Corp said on Thursday that Harcourt General Inc, which indicated that it would increase its merger offer to $21.00 a share, is permitted to begin due diligence during the next week.
National Education's board had rejected Harcourt General's $19.50 a share cash tender offer, it said.

National Education said there was no assurance that the discussion with Harcourt would lead to an acceptable deal or a deal that would be approved by Harcourt or National Education's board of directors.
Harcourt commenced an all-cash tender offer for National Education's shares on April 21, 1997, National Education said.
